Description: Calcite set of paint-pots/ink-wells: a rectangular base with eight vessel-like compartments hollowed out, the rims protruding from top, and 2 ridges beneath.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Mit Rahina (Memphis) (said to be from)
Exhibition history: 2011 6 Oct - 19 Feb, The British Museum, 'Grayson Perry'
